# guestIdentifier

**Instance Property**

A developer-created string that identifies a guest player.

## Declaration

```swift
var guestIdentifier: String? { get }
```

## Creating a guest player

- **anonymousGuestPlayer(withIdentifier:)**: Creates a guest player with the specified identifier.

items.description: Creates a guest player with the specified identifier.
items.name: anonymousGuestPlayer(withIdentifier:)
